# Maps Entitlement

**Property List Key**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the app may provide directions beyond what Maps supports, such as subway routes, hiking trails, and bike paths.

## Discussion

To add this entitlement to your app, enable the Maps capability in Xcode.

## Deprecated entitlements

- **Inter-App Audio Entitlement**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the app may exchange audio with other Inter-App Audio-enabled apps.
- **All files entitlement**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the app may have access to all files.
